io.odysz.semantics

Interface IUser


  • public interface IUser

    Provide user e.g. servlet session information to modify some date in AST.

    This is not necessary if using semantic-transact directly. But if the caller want to set user information like fingerpirnt for modified records, this can be used to let semantic-transact providing user identity to the semantics handler.

    Author:
    ody

    • Method Detail

      • dbLog

        default ArrayList<String> dbLog(ArrayList<String> sqls)
        The sqls is committed to database, do something for logging. If there are some operation needing to update db, return those sql statements. Make sure the committed sqls is not returned, only logging sqls are needed.
        Parameters:
        sqls -
        Returns:
        SQLs for logging

      • login

        default boolean login(Object request)
               throws TransException
        Check user log in (already has pswd, iv and user Id from db)
        Parameters:
        request - request object. In sematic.jserv, it's SessionReq object.
        Returns:
        true: ok; false: failed
        Throws:
        TransException - Checking login information failed
